title: Sing To The Promise
itunes:title: Sing To The Promise
description:
Like a seed needs water to thrive, God's promises need our faith to grow. When you stand in faith and thanksgiving, you prepare the way for healing and breakthrough. It's time to start singing to the promise. 

Your best days are still ahead, and together we can make a difference in this world with the message of God's hope and love.

To give visit JoelOsteen.com/GiveHope

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
